<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">DB</font></b>&#148; means
Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas (formerly known as Bankers Trust Company),
in its capacity as Administrative Agent for Lenders.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">New Revolving Loan Commitment</font></b>&#148;&#160; means the commitment of a Lender to make New
Revolving Loans to Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(b), and &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">New Revolving Loan Commitments</font></b>&#148; means such commitments of
all Lenders in the aggregate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">New Revolving Loans</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>means the Loans made by Lenders to Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(b).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">New Senior Subordinated
Notes</font></b>&#148; means the $150,000,000 in initial aggregate principal amount
of unsecured senior subordinated notes issued by Company on the Third Amendment
Effective Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">New Senior Subordinated
Note Indenture</font></b>&#148; means the indenture pursuant to which the New Senior
Subordinated Notes are issued as such indenture may be amended from time to
time to the extent permitted under subsection&nbsp;7.9.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Prepayment Premium</font></b>&#148;
has the meaning set forth in subsection&nbsp;2.4B(i).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Third Amendment</font></b>&#148; means the Third Amendment to the Credit Agreement,
dated as of December&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2004, by and among Company,
Requisite Lenders, Collateral Agent, Syndication Agent, Documentation Agent and
Administrative Agent.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Third Amendment Effective
Date</font></b>&#148; means the date on
which the Third Amendment became effective in accordance with its terms.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;Tranche C1 Term Loans&#148; </font></b>means the Loans made (and/or converted into
Tranche C1 Term Loans from Tranche C Term Loans outstanding immediately prior
to the Third Amendment Effective Date) to the Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(c).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tranche C1 Term Loan
Commitment</font></b>&#148; means the
commitment of a Lender to make (and/or convert into Tranche C1 Term Loans from
Tranche C Term Loans outstanding immediately prior to the Third Amendment
Effective Date), a Tranche C1 Term Loan to Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(c),
and &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tranche C1 Term Loan Commitments&#148;</font></b> means such commitments of all Lenders in the
aggregate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">10-3/8% Senior
Subordinated Notes</font></b>&#148; means Company&#146;s $260,000,000 in initial
aggregate principal amount of 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes due 2011.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">10-3/8% Senior
Subordinated Note Indenture</font></b>&#148; means the indenture pursuant to which
the 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes were issued, as amended pursuant to the
2004 Consent Solicitation and as such indenture may be further amended from
time to time to the extent permitted under subsection&nbsp;7.9.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">2004 Consent Solicitation</font></b>&#148;
means the solicitation by Company from the holders of outstanding 10-3/8%
Senior Subordinated Notes of consents to certain amendments to the 10-3/8%
Senior Subordinated Note Indenture in accordance with the terms of the 2004
Tender Offer.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">2004 Tender Offer</font></b>&#148; means the offer by Company to repurchase up
to 100% of the outstanding 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes pursuant to the
2004 Tender Offer Materials.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">2004 Tender Offer Materials</font></b>&#148; means the Offer to Purchase and
Consent Solicitation Statement dated November&nbsp;30, 2004 related to the 2004
Tender Offer and the accompanying Consent and Letter of Transmittal.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;1.1
of the Credit Agreement is hereby further amended by deleting the definitions
of &#147;Applicable Commitment Fee Percentage&#148;, &#147;Applicable Tranche C Base Rate
Margin&#148;, &#147;Applicable Tranche C LIBOR Margin&#148;, &#147;Documentation Agent&#148;, <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;</font></b>Reference Lenders&#148;, &#147;Related Agreements&#148;, &#147;Revolving Loan
Commitment&#148;, &#147;Revolving Loan Commitment Termination Date&#148;, &#147;Revolving Loans&#148;, &#147;Subordinated
Indebtedness&#148;, &#147;Syndication Agent&#148;, &#147;Tranche C Term Loan Commitment&#148;, and &#147;Tranche
C Term Loans&#148; in their entirety, and substituting the following therefor,
respectively:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Applicable Commitment Fee Percentage</font></b>&#148; means, as at any date of
determination, a rate per annum equal to 0.50%.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;</font><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Applicable
Tranche C Base Rate Margin</font></b>&#148;
means with respect to any date of determination on and after the Third
Amendment Effective Date, a rate per annum equal to 1.25%.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;</font><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Applicable
Tranche C LIBOR Margin</font></b>&#148;
means with respect to any date of determination on and after the Third
Amendment Effective Date, a rate per annum equal to 2.25%.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Documentation Agent</font></b>&#148;
means, collectively, Lehman Commercial Paper Inc. and Merrill Lynch &amp; Co.,
Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner &amp; Smith Incorporated, as Co-Documentation Agents.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Reference Lenders</font></b>&#148;
means DB and Syndication Agent.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Related Agreements</font></b>&#148;
means, collectively, the 2004 Tender Offer Materials, the 10-3/8% Senior
Subordinated Notes, the 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Note Indenture, the New
Senior Subordinated Notes, the New Senior Subordinated Note Indenture, and any
Refinancing Sub Debt and any indenture pursuant to which such Refinancing Sub
Debt is issued.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Revolving Loan Commitment</font></b>&#148;
means the commitment of a Lender to make Revolving Loans to Company pursuant to
subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(a) and subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(b), and &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Revolving Loan Commitments</font></b>&#148; means such commitments of all
Lenders in the aggregate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Revolving Loan Commitment
Termination Date</font></b>&#148; means (i) with respect to Revolving Loan
Commitments under subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(a), the seventh anniversary of the
Closing Date or such earlier date on which such Revolving Loan Commitments may
be terminated pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.4B or Section&nbsp;8, and (ii) with
respect to Revolving Loan Commitments under subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(b), December&nbsp;29,
2010 or such earlier date on which such Revolving Loan Commitments may be
terminated pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.4B or Section&nbsp;8.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Revolving Loans</font></b>&#148;
means the Loans made by Lenders to Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(a)
and subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(b).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Subordinated Indebtedness</font></b>&#148;
means (i) the Indebtedness of Company evidenced by the 10-3/8% Senior
Subordinated Notes, (ii) the Indebtedness of Company evidenced by the New
Senior Subordinated Notes and (iii) the Indebtedness of Company evidenced by
any Refinancing Sub Debt.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Syndication Agent</font></b>&#148;
means Citigroup North America, Inc. in its capacity as Syndication Agent.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tranche C Term Loan
Commitment</font></b>&#148; means the commitment of a Lender to make a Tranche C
Term Loan to Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(a), subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(b)
or subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(c), and &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tranche C Term Loan
Commitments</font></b>&#148; means such commitments of all Lenders in the aggregate.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15426-1\task265936\15426-1-kg.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 30 16:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tranche C Term Loans</font></b>&#148;
means the Loans made by Lenders to Company pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(a),
subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(b) or subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(c).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">C.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;1.1
of the Credit Agreement is hereby further amended by deleting the definition of
&#147;BTCo&#148; in its entirety.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments
to Subsection&nbsp;2.1:&nbsp;&nbsp;Commitments; Making of Loans; the Register;
Notes</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding at the end thereof a new
clause (c) as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Tranche
C1 Term Loans</u>. &#160;Each Lender that has
a Tranche C1 Term Loan Commitment severally agrees (a) to convert on the Third
Amendment Effective Date each New Tranche C Term Loan made by such Lender under
this Agreement and outstanding immediately prior to giving effect to the Third
Amendment to a Tranche C1 Term Loan hereunder (and Company hereby agrees to
such conversion) and (b) to make to Company on the Third Amendment Effective
Date Tranche C1 Term Loans hereunder in an amount equal to the excess (if any)
of such Lender&#146;s Tranche C1 Term Loan Commitment over such Lender&#146;s New Tranche
C Term Loans (if any) being converted on the Third Amendment Effective Date to
Tranche C1 Term Loans, so that, after giving effect to the conversion of such New
Tranche C Term Loans into Tranche C1 Term Loans pursuant to clause (a) above
and the making of all such Tranche C1 Term Loans pursuant to clause (b) above,
each Lender that has a Tranche C1 Term Loan Commitment will have made or deemed
to have made, as the case may be, a Tranche C1 Term Loan to Company in an
amount equal to its Pro Rata Share of the aggregate amount of the Tranche C1
Term Loan Commitments, to be used for the purposes identified in subsection&nbsp;2.5D.&#160; The aggregate amount of the Tranche C1 Term
Loan Commitments is $390,000,000.&#160; Each
Tranche C1 Term Loan shall be deemed to have the same Interest Period as the New
Tranche C Term Loan it replaces, and no making of or conversion into a Tranche
C1 Term Loan hereunder shall result in the commencement of a new Interest
Period.&#160; Amounts borrowed (or converted)
under this subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iii)(c) and subsequently repaid and prepaid may
not be reborrowed.&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)
of the Credit Agreement is hereby further amended by inserting an &#147;(a)&#148; in
front of the phrase &#147;Revolving Loans&#148;, replacing the phrase &#147;this subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)&#148;
with the phrase &#147;this subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(a)&#148;, and by adding at the end
thereof a new clause (b) as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>New
Revolving Loans</u>.&#160; Each Lender
severally agrees, subject to the limitations set forth below with respect to
the maximum amount of New Revolving Loans permitted to be outstanding from time
to time, to lend to Company from time to time during the period from the Third
Amendment Effective Date to but excluding the Revolving Loan Commitment
Termination Date an aggregate amount not exceeding its Pro Rata Share of the
aggregate amount of the New Revolving Loan Commitments to be used for the
purposes identified in subsection&nbsp;2.5B.&#160;
The aggregate original</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="center">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15426-1\task265936\15426-1-kg.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 30 16:13 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">amount of the New Revolving Loan Commitments is $70,000,000;
<u>provided</u> that the New Revolving Loan Commitments of Lenders shall be
adjusted to give effect to any assignments of the New Revolving Loan
Commitments pursuant to subsection&nbsp;10.1B; and <u>provided</u>, <u>further</u>
that the amount of the New Revolving Loan Commitments shall be reduced from
time to time by the amount of any reductions thereto made pursuant to subsection&nbsp;2.4B(ii).&#160; Each Lender&#146;s New Revolving Loan Commitment
shall expire on the Revolving Loan Commitment Termination Date and all New
Revolving Loans and all other amounts owed hereunder with respect to the New
Revolving Loans and the New Revolving Loan Commitments shall be paid in full no
later than that date.&#160; Amounts borrowed
under this subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(b) may be repaid and reborrowed to but
excluding the Revolving Loan Commitment Termination Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Anything
contained in this Agreement to the contrary notwithstanding, the New Revolving
Loans and the New Revolving Loan Commitments shall be subject to the limitation
that in no event shall the Total Utilization of Revolving Loan Commitments at
any time exceed the New Revolving Loan Commitments then in effect.&#148;.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments
to Subsection&nbsp;2.2: Interest on the Loans</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.2A
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>deleting
the phrase &#147;and the Revolving Loans&#148; from clause (i) thereof, renumbering
clause &#147;(iv)&#148; as clause &#147;(v)&#148;, and inserting a new clause (iv) immediately
prior to clause (v) as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subject to the provisions of
subsections 2.2E and 2.7, the Revolving Loans shall bear interest through
maturity as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>if
a Base Rate Loan, then at the sum of the Base Rate <u>plus</u> the Applicable
Revolving Base Rate Margin; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>if
a LIBOR Loan, then at the sum of LIBOR <u>plus</u> the Applicable Revolving
LIBOR Margin.&#148;; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>deleting
the phrase &#147;Applicable Tranche A Base Rate Margin&#148; from clause (iv) thereof and
substituting the phrase &#147;Applicable Revolving Base Rate Margin&#148; therefor.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.2B(v)
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the phrase &#147;no Interest
Period with respect to any portion of the Tranche C Term Loans shall extend
beyond the ninth anniversary of the Closing Date&#148; and by substituting the
phrase &#147;no Interest Period with respect to any portion of the Tranche C Term
Loans shall extend beyond December&nbsp;29, 2011&#148;.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font></div>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendment
to Subsection&nbsp;2.4: Repayments, Prepayments and Reductions in Revolving
Loan Commitments; General Provisions Regarding Payments; Application of
Proceeds of Collateral and Payments Under the Guaranties</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.4A(iii)
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding at the end thereof a new
clause (c) as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Scheduled
Payments of Tranche C1 Term Loans</u>.&#160; Company
shall make principal payments on the Tranche C1 Term Loans in annual installments
beginning on December&nbsp;29, 2005 as set forth below until the Tranche C1
Term Loans are paid in full, each such installment to be in the correlative
amount set forth below:</p>

  <td width="64%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:64.06%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 24.5pt;text-indent:-10.1pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Total:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;">&nbsp;</font></font></u></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.86%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="28%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:28.14%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">390,000,000.00</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;">&nbsp;</font></font></u></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">; <u>provided</u> that the scheduled installments of
principal of the Tranche C1 Term Loans set forth above shall be reduced in
connection with any voluntary or mandatory prepayments of the Tranche C1 Term
Loans in accordance with subsection&nbsp;2.4B(iv); and <u>provided</u>, <u>further</u>
that the Tranche C1 Term Loans and all other amounts owed hereunder with
respect to the Tranche C1 Term Loans shall be paid in full no later than December&nbsp;29,
2011, and the final installment payable by Company in respect of the Tranche C1
Term Loans on such date shall be in an amount, if such amount is different from
that specified above, sufficient to repay all amounts owing by Company under
this Agreement with respect to the Tranche C1 Term Loans.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.4B(i)
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following at the end
thereof:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;In the event
that, prior to the first anniversary of the Third Amendment Effective Date but,
for the avoidance of doubt, after the Third Amendment Effective Date, any
Lender with Tranche C Term Loan Exposure receives a prepayment of Tranche C
Term Loans, in whole or in part, from the proceeds of Indebtedness which is
incurred substantially concurrently with such prepayment, whether incurred
under this Agreement or otherwise, then at the time of such prepayment Company
shall pay to each Lender receiving a prepayment a prepayment premium (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Prepayment</font></b></font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Premium</font></b>&#148;)
equal to 1.00% of the principal amount of the Tranche C Term Loan prepayment;
provided however that in the event that such prepayment occurs as a result of a
Change of Control with respect to the Company, then no Prepayment Premium pursuant
to this subsection&nbsp;2.4B(i) shall be owing with respect to such prepayment.&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">C.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.4B(iii)(b)
is hereby amended by deleting the phrase clause (i) thereof and substituting
the following therefor:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(i) the Consolidated Leverage Ratio shall be equal to
or greater than 3.00:1.00 as of the last day of any Fiscal Year (commencing
with Fiscal Year 2005)&#148;.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments
to Subsection&nbsp;2.5:&#160; Use of Proceeds</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;2.5
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new subparagraph (D) at
the end thereof as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">D.</font></b></font><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Tranche
C1 Term Loans</b>.&#160; The proceeds of the Tranche
C1 Term Loans shall be applied on the Third Amendment Effective Date by Company
first to repay in full the principal amount of all New Tranche C Term Loans
outstanding immediately prior to giving effect to the Third Amendment which are
not converted into Tranche C1 Term Loans and thereafter any remaining proceeds
shall be applied to refinance Company&#146;s 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes, to
pay accrued interest and tender premiums thereon and to pay fees and expenses
related to the Third Amendment, the refinancing of the 10-3/8% Senior
Subordinated Notes and the issuance of the New Senior Subordinated Notes.&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments
to Subsection&nbsp;2.6:&#160; Special

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsection&nbsp;2.6 of the Credit Agreement is hereby

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>provided</u> that no amounts shall be payable

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">irrevocably purchased from the Issuing Lender a
participation in such Letter of Credit and any drawings thereunder in an amount
equal to such Lender&#146;s Pro Rata Share of the maximum amount which is or at any
time may become available to be drawn thereunder.&#160; Upon satisfaction of the conditions set forth
in Section&nbsp;2 of the Third Amendment, each Lender having a New Revolving
Loan Commitment shall be deemed to have irrevocably purchased from the Issuing
Lender of any Letter of Credit outstanding on the Third Amendment Effective
Date a participation in such Letter of Credit and any drawings under a Letter
of Credit which drawings are outstanding on the Third Amendment Effective Date in
an amount equal to such Lender&#146;s Pro Rata Share of the maximum amount which is
or at any time may become available to be drawn under such Letter of Credit and
of any such outstanding drawings.&#148;.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsection&nbsp;7.1 of the Credit Agreement is hereby
amended by deleting clauses (v) and (vi) in their entirety and by substituting
therefor the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

may become and remain liable with respect to (a) the New Senior Subordinated

of which are used to repurchase, redeem, defease or otherwise prepay or retire
(collectively, to &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Refinance</font></b>&#148; or a
&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Refinancing</font></b>&#148;), the New Senior
Subordinated Notes (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Replaced Debt</font></b>&#148;);
<u>provided</u> that, in the case of (b) such Indebtedness is unsecured and
subordinated to the Obligations, such Indebtedness shall not mature prior to six
months after the stated final maturity of all Indebtedness under this Agreement,
after giving effect to the incurrence of such Indebtedness and the payment of
interest thereon, Company shall be in <u>pro</u>  <u>forma</u> compliance with
subsection&nbsp;7.6 of this Agreement, and the other terms of such Indebtedness
(including amortization schedule, covenants, defaults, remedies, subordination</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provisions (including with respect to any subordinated
guaranties) and other material terms thereof) shall be no less favorable in any
material respect to Lenders than the terms of the New Senior Subordinated Notes,
and the aggregate principal amount of such Indebtedness shall not exceed the
sum of (x) the aggregate principal amount of the Replaced Debt thereby
Refinanced <u>plus</u> (y) the amount of any tender premium, call premium or
similar premium (any such premium being a <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#147;Refinancing Premium&#148;</font></b>)
paid by Company in connection with such Refinancing <u>plus</u> (z) the costs
of issuance of such Indebtedness, including placement agent fees or
underwriting commissions (such Indebtedness meeting the requirements set forth
above being &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Refinancing Sub Debt</font></b>&#148;).&#148;.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.11</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendment
to Subsection&nbsp;7.4:&#160; Guarantee
Obligations</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsection&nbsp;7.4 of the Credit Agreement is hereby
amended by deleting clauses (vii) and (viii) in their entirety and substituting
the following therefor:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(vii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Company&#146;s
Subsidiaries may become and remain liable with respect to Guarantee Obligations
under subordinated guaranties of the New Senior Subordinated Notes and the
Refinancing Sub Debt;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Company&#146;s
Subsidiaries may remain liable with respect to subordinated Guarantee
Obligations under the 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Note Indenture with respect
to the 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes not tendered pursuant to the 2004
Tender Offer and which have not been defeased in accordance with subsection&nbsp;7.5(ii)
and the 10-3/8 Senior Subordinated Note Indenture; and&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.12</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments
to Subsection&nbsp;7.5:&#160; Restricted
Junior Payments</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsection&nbsp;7.5
of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)
deleting clause (i)&#160; thereof in its
entirety and by substituting the following therefor:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Company
may make scheduled payments of principal in respect of any 10-3/8% Senior
Subordinated Notes not tendered pursuant to the 2004 Tender Offer, and which
has not been defeased in accordance with subsection&nbsp;7.5(ii)(b) and the
10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Note Indenture, in each case in accordance with the
terms of, and only to the extent required by, and subject to the subordination
provisions contained in, the 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Note Indenture,&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)
deleting clause (ii)(b) thereof in its entirety and by substituting the following
therefor:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>repurchase,
redeem, defease or otherwise prepay or retire any 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated
Notes not tendered pursuant to the 2004 Tender Offer on terms (set forth in the
10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Note Indenture or otherwise) no less favorable in
any material respect to Company and Lenders than the terms of the 2004 Tender
Offer;&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)
deleting clause (ii)(c) thereof in its entirety and by substituting the
following therefor:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>repurchase,
redeem, defease or otherwise prepay or retire the New Senior Subordinated Notes
and the Refinancing Sub Debt; <u>provided</u> that, in each case, after giving
effect thereto the Available Amount Usage shall not exceed the Available
Amount;&#148;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">; and
(d) deleting clause (ii)(g) thereof in its entirety and by substituting the
following therefor:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>redeem,
repurchase or otherwise prepay (1) the 10-3/8% Senior Subordinated Notes with
the proceeds of the New Senior Subordinated Notes and the Tranche C1 Term Loans
and (2) the New Senior Subordinated Notes with the proceeds of the Refinancing
Sub Debt.&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.13</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Amendments
to Subsection&nbsp;7.8: Capital Expenditures</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;7.8A
is hereby amended by deleting the text of such subsection&nbsp;in its entirety
and by substituting therefor the phrase &#147;Intentionally Omitted&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Subsection&nbsp;7.8B
is hereby amended by deleting the phrase &#147;$75,000,000 (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Minimum Amount</font></b>&#148;)&#148; thereof in its entirety and by
substituting the following phrase therefor &#147;(a) $105,000,000 in Fiscal Year
2005 and Fiscal Year 2006, or (b) $110,000,000 in Fiscal Year 2007 and
thereafter (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Minimum Amount</font></b>&#148;)&#148;.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.14</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>References
to Bankers Trust Company and BTCo</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of the Third Amendment Effective Date, all
references to &#147;Bankers Trust Company&#148; or &#147;BTCo&#148; contained in the Credit
Agreement (and the other Loan Documents) shall be deemed to be references to &#147;Deutsche
Bank Trust Company Americas&#148; or &#147;DB&#148;, respectively.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.15</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Substitution
of Exhibits and Schedules</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><u>Exhibit
VI</u> to the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting said <u>Exhibit VI</u>
in its entirety and substituting in place thereof a new <u>Exhibit VI</u> in
the form of <u>Annex A</u> to this Amendment.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><u>Exhibit
VII</u> to the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting said <u>Exhibit
VII</u> in its entirety and substituting in place thereof a new <u>Exhibit VII</u>
in the form of <u>Annex B</u> to this Amendment.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">1.16</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Limited
Waiver</u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon termination of the Revolving Loan Commitments
outstanding under subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(a) by Company on the Third Amendment
Effective Date, Requisite Lenders hereby waive any failure of such termination
to comply with the requirements of subsection&nbsp;2.4B(ii) of the Credit
Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Section&nbsp;2.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>CONDITIONS
TO EFFECTIVENESS</b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Amendment shall become effective only upon the
satisfaction of all of the following conditions precedent (the date of
satisfaction of such conditions being referred to herein as the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Third Amendment Effective Date</font></b>&#148;) set forth in this Section&nbsp;2:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Corporate Documents</b>.&#160;
On or before the Third Amendment Effective Date, Company shall, and
shall cause each other Credit Support Party to, deliver to Lenders (or to
Administrative Agent for Lenders with sufficient originally executed copies,
where appropriate, for each Lender and its counsel), with respect to Company or
such other Credit Support Party, as the case may be, the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Secretary&#146;s
Certificates, in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to Administrative
Agent and dated the Third Amendment Effective Date, certifying that (1) the
Organizational Documents of Company, (2) the resolutions of the Board of
Directors of Company and each other Credit Support Party and (3) the signature
and incumbency certificate of Company and each other Credit Support Party, in
each case as delivered or reaffirmed to Administrative Agent on the First
Amendment Effective Date, are in full force and effect and have not been
amended or modified in any respect since the First Amendment Effective Date;
and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Resolutions
of Company&#146;s Board of Directors approving and authorizing the execution,
delivery, and performance of this Amendment and approving and authorizing the
execution, delivery and payment of the Tranche C1 Term Loans and the New
Revolving Loans, certified as of the Third Amendment Effective Date by its
corporate secretary or an assistant secretary as being in full force and effect
without modification or amendment;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Third
Amendment</b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Administrative
Agent shall have received from (a) the Requisite Lenders, (b) Administrative
Agent and Issuing Lender, (c) each Lender having a Tranche C1 Term Loan
Commitment, (d) each Lender having a New Revolving Loan Commitment and (e)
Company and the other Credit Support Parties, (1) a counterpart of this
Amendment signed on behalf of such party and/or (2) written evidence
satisfactory to Administrative Agent that such party has signed a counterpart
of a commitment with respect to such Lender&#146;s Tranche C1 Term Loan Commitment
or New Revolving Loan Commitment, as the case may be; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Administrative
Agent shall have received from Company on the Third Amendment Effective Date notice
that Company is terminating all Revolving Loan Commitments outstanding under
subsection&nbsp;2.1A(iv)(a) of the Credit Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">C.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Opinion of Counsel</b>. <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#160;</font></b>On or before the Third Amendment
Effective Date, Company shall have delivered to Lenders (or to Administrative
Agent for Lenders with sufficient originally executed copies, where
appropriate, for each Lender and its counsel) originally executed copies
of one or more favorable written opinions of (i) Latham &amp; Watkins LLP, special
counsel for Loan Parties, and (ii) Russell D. Phillips, Jr., Esq., General</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
